resources.string: Show barcodes to your phone\'s camera to scan them and lookup product ratings.
Swipe up to review your history of recently scanned products.
If you scan a product we haven\'t discovered, take a photo so we can add it.
TasteTags are metadata for describing the taste of a product. Add as many as you like!\n\nOrange TasteTags are new tags that will be reviewed before being accepted.
